pullrequest.title: Added an IndexedMzML class to make random access of indexed MzML documents possible.

content.raw: Under the current implementation, you're right, that would be doable, and ultimately more compact that playing games with hidden classes. I'm away until Thursday, at which point I'll do those rewrites.
content.html: Under the current implementation, you're right, that would be doable, and ultimately more compact that playing games with hidden classes. I'm away until Thursday, at which point I'll do those rewrites.
